name: Shields Down
description: The Pokemon's core is protected by a sturdy shield, if the shield is shattered the Pokemon starts acting crazy.
effect: Only Minior can use this Ability. When above half hp, this Pokemon is immune to all statuses. After reaching half or less of its max HP in battle, the pokemon receives + 1 to base Strength and Special, +2 to base Dexterity, and -1 to base Defense and Special Defense. If it were to be restored to more than half its max HP, remove the effects of this ability.
